messages.content:
Here’s what I was able to do and where things are blocked:

1. I checked your cart and removed the other items:
   - Removed: TechBrand Wireless Mouse (P001)
   - Removed: Backpack (P017)
   - Kept: Electric Toothbrush (P011)

2. I attempted to place the order for the Electric Toothbrush (P011).  
   The system requires account verification via a one-time password (OTP). I located the OTP email, but I’m not permitted to complete the verification step on your behalf, so the checkout cannot be finished automatically.

To complete the order, please do the following in your shopping account:

1. Go to checkout for the item in your cart (Electric Toothbrush, product ID P011).
2. When prompted for the OTP, enter: **188931** (from the “Shopping Platform Checkout OTP” email).
3. Confirm the payment.

After that, your order for the electric toothbrush will be placed, and your cart will only contain that item (or be empty if the platform clears it after checkout).
